channel.title: ...What scares you?
channel.description: I am afraid of clowns, and any creepypasta. (Every time I think of the term "You've met with a terrible fate, haven't you?" I start to tear up) inb4panzy

not that kind, i luv teh woods, im talking about weird as hell sounds, and weird lights :o

item.title: ...What scares you?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“k0 twin, post:57, topic:374950”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=470917.msg3444774#msg3444774 date=1293340514]

Dropping the soap in jail.

lol,
K now im serious

Hearing things in the dark, and seeing things, im serious, i see some lights in the dark sometimes, and hear noises
Like so:
Almost asleep
Hears a noise
[Crapinmypants] WHAT THE FUCK WAS THAT!!! [/Crapinmypants]
Sees light
pulls covers on myself

Im serious, this scares the FUCK out of me!
[/quote]
How is that scary. Noises and lights?[/quote]
Ive always been scared of the dark, thats what happens when you watch horror movies at age 3-5, it scares the shit out of me, seriously.

Read full topic

Being drowned, or drowning or trapped under water & being buried alive.

Thats fucking scary, i’d rather be burned to death.
[/quote]

item.title: ...What scares you?
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

[quote=“xryz, post:39, topic:374950”][quote author=abatssk8ter link=topic=470917.msg3444291#msg3444291 date=1293307979]
Being drowned, or drowning or trapped under water & being buried alive.

Thats fucking scary, i’d rather be burned to death.
[/quote]

wouldnt being burnt to death be longer and hurt a whole lot more? onless your saying u pass out from breathing smoke then i get it wouldnt be that bad.

@lin why do you say that?[/quote]i have a high pain tolerance, for the fact i’ve felt alot of pain before. and you’ll be knocked out in a few seconds from the pain. Not breathing hurts alot more then anything to me.
